document.docAuthor: Antić, Dragan Ž. & Makarov, Slobodan E.
document.masterDocTitle: The Caucasus as a major hotspot of biodiversity: Evidence from the millipede family Anthroleucosomatidae (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Caucasus as a major hotspot of biodiversity: Evidence from the millipede family Anthroleucosomatidae (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida)

figureCitation.captionText-0: FIGURE 110. Metamastigophorophyllon martensi (Mauriès, 1982), comb. nov., male from Farm Azerbaijan, ca 10 km SE of Lerik, Azerbaijan, habitus. Scale line = 1 mm.
figureCitation.captionText-1: FIGURE 111. Metamastigophorophyllon martensi (Mauriès, 1982), comb. nov., male from Farm Azerbaijan, ca 10 km SE of Lerik, Azerbaijan. A. Pleurotergite 15, posterior view. B. Pleurotergites 14 and 15, lateral view. C. Prozonite 15, dorsal view. D. Pleuritergite 15, dorsal view. E. Prefemur 5. F. Leg-pair 7.
figureCitation.captionText-2: FIGURE 112. Metamastigophorophyllon martensi (Mauriès, 1982), comb. nov., male from Farm Azerbaijan, ca 10 km SE of Lerik, Azerbaijan, anterior gonopods. A. Anterior view. B. Anterolateral view. C. Lateral view. D. and E. Posterior view. F. Distal view.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Persedicus martensi
Mauriès, 1982 : 385
–390, figs 1–6, syn. nov.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Diagnosis. Differs from the other
Metamastigophorophyllon
species by the general shape of sternal lamella and inner branches of the anterior gonopods.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 110.
Metamastigophorophyllon martensi (Mauriès, 1982)
, comb. nov. , male from Farm Azerbaijan, ca 10 km SE of Lerik, Azerbaijan, habitus. Scale line = 1 mm.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality.
IRAN : Province Mazandaran , 11 km E Alasht , dense forest, wet litter,
1400 m
asl.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 111.
Metamastigophorophyllon martensi (Mauriès, 1982)
, comb. nov. , male from Farm Azerbaijan, ca 10 km SE of Lerik, Azerbaijan. A. Pleurotergite 15, posterior view. B. Pleurotergites 14 and 15, lateral view. C. Prozonite 15, dorsal view. D. Pleuritergite 15, dorsal view. E. Prefemur 5. F. Leg-pair 7.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution.
Azerbaijan
, Iran ( Mauriès 1982 ; Enghoff & Moravvej 2005 , present study) ( Fig. 166 , violet circle).
